Readonlystyle

style: {
    fontSize: "initial";
} = ...

The style associated with the element. Typically, for a static value:

{
     tag: 'div',
     style: {
         backgroundColor: 'blue'
     }
}

For more details on hyphenated properties, see CSSAttribute.
